businessConnector.name: Marketo Asset Rest API
businessConnector.tags: Channels,Email Templates,Emails,File Contents,Files,Folders,Form Fields,Forms,Git,Landing Page Content,Landing Page Templates,Landing Pages,Marketo,Programs,Segments,Snippets,Tags,Tokens,service connector

action.label: updateProgramUsingPOST
action.name: updateProgramUsingPOST
action.description: Update Program Metadata. Updates the target program's metadata. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: getProgramByIdUsingGET
action.name: getProgramByIdUsingGET
action.description: Get Program by Id. Retrieves the program record for the given id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

action.label: cloneEmailUsingPOST
action.name: cloneEmailUsingPOST
action.description: Clone Email. Clones the target email. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: addModuleUsingPOST
action.name: addModuleUsingPOST
action.description: Add Email Module. Adds a new module to an email, with the given id. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

parameter.description: Name of the module
parameter.label: name
parameter.name: name

parameter.description: Index of the module. Determines the order of the module in the email.
parameter.label: index
parameter.name: index

action.label: createEmailUsingPOST
action.name: createEmailUsingPOST
action.description: Create Email. Creates a new email asset. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: getEmailUsingGET
action.name: getEmailUsingGET
action.description: Get Emails. Returns a list of emails matching the given filter parameters. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

parameter.description: Status filter for draft or approved versions
parameter.label: status
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: JSON representation of parent folder, with members 'id', and 'type' which may be 'Folder' or 'Program'
parameter.label: folder
parameter.name: folder

parameter.description: Integer offset for paging
parameter.label: offset
parameter.name: offset

parameter.description: Maximum number of channels to return. Max 200, default 20.
parameter.label: maxReturn
parameter.name: maxReturn

action.label: approveLandingPageUsingPOST
action.name: approveLandingPageUsingPOST
action.description: Approve Landing Page Draft. Approves the current draft of the landing page. Required Permissions: Approve Assets

action.label: cloneLpFormsUsingPOST
action.name: cloneLpFormsUsingPOST
action.description: Clone Form. Clones the target form. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: updateFormSubmitButtonUsingPOST
action.name: updateFormSubmitButtonUsingPOST
action.description: Update Submit Button. Updates the submit button configuration for the target form. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: updateSnippetUsingPOST
action.name: updateSnippetUsingPOST
action.description: Update Snippet Metadata. Updates the metadata of the snippet. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.name: getSnippetByIdUsingGET
action.description: Get Snippet by Id. Retrieves the target snippet record. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

parameter.description: Status filter for draft or approved versions
parameter.label: status
parameter.name: status

action.label: getFileByIdUsingGET
action.name: getFileByIdUsingGET
action.description: Get File by Id. Returns the file record for the given id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

action.label: discardDraftUsingPOST_1
action.name: discardDraftUsingPOST_1
action.description: Discard Email Template Draft. Discards the current draft of the email template. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: deleteFolderUsingPOST
action.name: deleteFolderUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Folder. Deletes the designated folder. Deletion will fail if the folder has content. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: createLpFormsUsingPOST
action.name: createLpFormsUsingPOST
action.description: Create Form. Creates a new form. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.name: browseForms2UsingGET
action.description: Get Forms. Retrieves a list of accessible form records from the target instance. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

action.name: updateDynamicContentUsingPOST

action.name: getSegmentationUsingGET

action.label: cloneLandingPageUsingPOST
action.name: cloneLandingPageUsingPOST
action.description: Clone Landing Page. Clones the target landing page. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: addFieldSetUsingPOST
action.name: addFieldSetUsingPOST
action.description: Add Fieldset to Form. Adds a field set to the target form. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: rearrangeModulesUsingPOST
action.name: rearrangeModulesUsingPOST
action.description: Rearrange Email Modules. Rearranges the modules in an email

parameter.description: JSON array of module positions. Each position must be a JSON object with members 'index' and a 'moduleId'. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets
parameter.label: positions
parameter.name: positions

action.label: updateLandingPageContentUsingPOST
action.name: updateLandingPageContentUsingPOST
action.description: Update Landing Page Content Section. Updates a content section the landing page. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: approveFromUsingPOST
action.name: approveFromUsingPOST
action.description: Approve Form Draft. Approves the current draft of the form. This will delete the current approved version of the form. Required Permissions: Approve Assets

action.label: deleteFormByIdUsingPOST
action.name: deleteFormByIdUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Form. Deletes the target form. Forms which are in use by landing pages may not be deleted until they are removed from all landing pages. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: unapproveDraftUsingPOST_1
action.name: unapproveDraftUsingPOST_1
action.description: Unapprove Email Template Draft. Unapproves the current approved version of the Email Template. Required Permissions: Approve Assets

action.label: getFolderContentUsingGET
action.name: getFolderContentUsingGET

action.label: updateThankYouPageByIdUsingPOST
action.name: updateThankYouPageByIdUsingPOST
action.description: Update Thank You Page. Updates the thank you page configuration for a given form. This update is destructive and the resulting draft will not have any memory of the previous configuration. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

action.name: createFolderUsingPOST

action.name: getFolderUsingGET

action.description: Clone Snippet. Clones the target snippet. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.name: deleteModuleUsingPOST

action.name: updateContentUsingPOST

parameter.label: latestUpdatedAt
parameter.name: latestUpdatedAt

action.label: deleteTemplateUsingPOST
action.name: deleteTemplateUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Email Template. Deletes the designated email template. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: deleteSnippetUsingPOST
action.name: deleteSnippetUsingPOST
action.description: Delete Snippet. Deletes the target snippet. The snippet may not be in use by emails or landing pages. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.label: updateEmailUsingPOST
action.name: updateEmailUsingPOST
action.description: Update Email Metadata. Updates the metadata of an email asset. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

action.description: Get Email By Id. Returns an email records by its id. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

parameter.label: status
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: Type of folder. 'Folder' or 'Program'

parameter.label: workSpace
parameter.name: workSpace

parameter.name: status

parameter.label: maxReturn
parameter.name: maxReturn

parameter.description: Integer offset for paging
parameter.label: offset
parameter.name: offset

parameter.description: JSON representation of parent folder, with members 'id', and 'type' which may be 'Folder' or 'Program'
parameter.label: folder
parameter.name: folder

action.label: createEmailFullContentUsingPOST
action.name: createEmailFullContentUsingPOST
action.description: Update Email Full Content. Replaces the HTML of an Email that has had its relationship broken from its template. Required Permissions: Read-Write Assets

parameter.description: content is multipart file parameter, id is path parameter
parameter.label: updateEmailFullContentRequest
parameter.name: updateEmailFullContentRequest

action.label: getEmailFullContentUsingGET
action.name: getEmailFullContentUsingGET
action.description: Get Email Full Content. Returns the serialized HTML version of the email. Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets. If leadId is passed in the request: Read-Only Lead, Read-Write Lead.

parameter.description: Id of the email
parameter.label: id
parameter.name: id

parameter.description: Status filter for draft or approved versions. Defaults to approved if asset is approved, draft if not.
parameter.label: status
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: The lead id to impersonate. Email is rendered as though it was received by this lead.
parameter.label: leadId
parameter.name: leadId

parameter.description: Email content type to return. Default is HTML.
parameter.label: type
parameter.name: type

action.label: unapproveLandingPageByIdUsingPOST
action.name: unapproveLandingPageByIdUsingPOST
action.description: Unapprove Landing Page. Unapproves the landing page, reverting it to a draft-only state. Required Permissions: Approve Assets
